backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor and all domain data types for CRM, portal, documents, finance, and NPS systems.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for all frontend files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global CSS.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that loads fonts and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper configuring Router, QueryClient, theming, auth, org context, and toast behavior.
frontend/src/app/layout/AppShell.tsx: Layout component that renders topbar, sidebar, and bottom navigation when authenticated.
frontend/src/app/layout/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with links to dashboard, contacts, portal, and a slide‑out menu.
frontend/src/app/layout/MobileNavMenu.ts: Mobile side menu showing internal and portal navigation sections with role‑based visibility.
frontend/src/app/layout/Sidebar.tsx: Renders a sidebar with internal and portal navigation items based on authentication and role permissions.
frontend/src/app/layout/Topbar.tsx: Displays the top navigation bar with logo, current organization, and user menu including logout and org switch.
Redirects authenticated users to the correct page based on role and organization state.
frontend/src/app/router/ProtectedRoute.t: Guards routes by requiring authentication and optionally an organization, showing loading or access denied states.
frontend/src/app/router/routes.tsx: Defines the application's full routing structure with protected internal and portal routes.
frontend/src/app/router/routeTree.tsx: Empty placeholder for route tree setup.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Provides authentication via Internet Identity, loading user profiles and exposing login/logout state.
frontend/src/auth/InternetIdentityAuthAd: Adapts Internet Identity and backend profile data into the app's user model and maps roles.
frontend/src/auth/roles.ts: Defines app roles, permissions, and helper functions for permission checks.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the brand logo image with a text fallback on load error.
frontend/src/components/states/AccessDen: UI screen showing an access denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/states/BackendCl: UI component that displays loading, error with retry, or children during backend client initialization.
frontend/src/components/states/QueryBoun: Wrapper component that shows loading, error, or empty states for React Query before rendering children.
Provides reusable loading, error, and empty state UI elements with optional messages and actions.
frontend/src/config/dataMode.ts: Defines data mode as always BACKEND and provides helpers reflecting removal of mock mode.
frontend/src/data/api/backendClient.ts: Implements DataClient using a backend actor, mapping roles and exposing org, profile, and placeholder project/task operations.
frontend/src/data/client.ts: Defines the DataClient interface and exports the backend client factory for unified backend routing.
frontend/src/data/mock/mockClient.ts: Empty placeholder for mock client implementation.
frontend/src/data/mock/seed.ts: Empty placeholder for mock data seeding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login management, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useStage1Client.ts: Hook that wraps backend client creation, exposing ready/loading/error states and a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/i18n/strings.ptBR.ts: Centralized Portuguese UI strings for actions, states, errors, success messages, and navigation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom color variables for light/dark themes, global styles, and utility classes like glass and page transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders App.
frontend/src/org/OrgProvider.tsx: Provides organization context, loads the user's current org from backend, and manages selection state.
frontend/src/pages/auth/CreateOrganizati: Form to create a new organization, call backend, update context, refresh queries, and redirect to dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with redirect if already authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SelectOrganizati: Lists organizations for selection, supports org creation for non-Firsty users, and updates current org.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SignupPage.tsx: Mock signup form with validation and redirect to login after simulated submission.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ActivitiesPa: Displays activities, fetches related data, and includes a modal to create new activities via mutations.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ContactsPage: Contacts CRUD page using react-query, dialogs, and mutations to list, create, update, and delete contacts for the current organization.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ContractsPag: Lists recurring contracts, computes MRR metrics, filters by status, and provides a dialog to create new contracts.
frontend/src/pages/internal/customer-suc: Modal dialog for submitting NPS responses, validating inputs and handling disabled state when no active campaign. Allows selecting a contact, score, and optional comment.
frontend/src/pages/internal/CustomerSucc: Customer success dashboard with health, NPS, and churn views, including campaign creation and NPS response handling.
frontend/src/pages/internal/DashboardPag: Overview dashboard aggregating contacts, deals, contracts, and activities to compute MRR, pipeline value, and recent activity.
frontend/src/pages/internal/DealDetailPa: Detail view for a single deal showing its metadata, contact info, status, and stage fetched via react-query.
Implements a finance dashboard that lists, filters, and creates transactions using React Query and a modal form. Calculates totals, balance, and recurring metrics for display.
frontend/src/pages/internal/PipelinePage: Manages sales pipeline deals with listing, filtering, and CRUD dialogs, integrating contacts and using React Query mutations. Supports stage-based filtering and navigation to deal details.
Displays static report cards, export history, and controls for selecting period and format. Provides UI for triggering report generation.
frontend/src/pages/internal/settings/Tea: UI for viewing members, pending invitations, and sending new team invites using react-query and Stage1 client.
frontend/src/pages/internal/SettingsPage: Renders organization settings with tabs for general info, team, notifications, security, and integrations. Includes editable fields for org details and preferences.
frontend/src/pages/portal/DeliverablesPa: Displays project deliverables grouped by status with filters and loading/error handling via react-query.
Lists organization documents and provides a dialog for uploading categorized files with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/portal/KpisPage.tsx: Fetches and displays project KPIs with trend indicators and updated timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/portal/MeetingsPage.t: Shows upcoming and past meetings for a project and allows creating new meetings via a modal form.
frontend/src/pages/portal/MessagesPage.t: Displays a support message thread for the current org, with message loading, sending, and role badges.
frontend/src/pages/portal/PortalSettings: Provides UI for mock portal settings with toggles and tabbed sections for notifications, display, and privacy.
frontend/src/pages/portal/ProjectDashboa: Shows selectable projects and a detailed dashboard for the active project using React Query data.
frontend/src/pages/portal/StageTimelineP: Loads a project's stage data and renders a timeline of project stages with status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/portal/TasksPage.tsx: Manages project tasks with loading, creation, status updates, and grouped task lists.
frontend/src/portal/useActiveProject.ts: Hook that stores and manages the active project ID in sessionStorage with setter and clear utilities.
frontend/src/toast/configureSonner.ts: Overrides Sonner's toast.success to enforce a default 1‑second duration.
frontend/src/types/model.ts: Defines core TypeScript types and interfaces for orgs, users, CRM entities, contracts, finance transactions, and customer success models.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, known issues, and feature requirements focused on backend client initialization and user/contact flows.
